programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: This episode follows birth parents Paula - who is looking for the son she became pregnant with in 1979 - and Justus Augustin, who yearns to find a daughter put up for adoption.

programme.desc: The unique bond between brothers is celebrated in the cases of Lee Sharp - who was told he was a foundling - and Peter MacDonald, who wants to see his big brother Trevor again.

programme.desc: A team of family and friends tackle a series of Top 10 list questions. Can they take on the Tenable tower and head home with the cash? Hosted by Warwick Davis.
